ygData.subject: Re: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have a lot of fun, but I still complain about the binding issue.  To me it s more of a balancing issue than anything else. Also, here s a question for
ygData.messageBody:
>Well if they're having a lot of fun, they must not be the people
>complaining about the binding issue then.


I have a lot of fun, but I still complain about the binding issue. To
me it's more of a balancing issue than anything else.
Also, here's a question for the folks that are against any change in
binding: If there were a change (whether it's bards able to bind, everyone
gets self-bind, anyone can be bound in any zone, etc), woudl you use it or
keep through the multiple zones to get to your corpse?

-=B=-
